channel.title: Executive Order on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Executive Order on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Trump orders cull of regulations governing commercial rocket launches
item.description: The head of the FAA’s commercial spaceflight division will become a political appointee.

item.title: New executive order puts all grants under political control
item.description: All new funding on hold until Trump administration can cancel any previously funded grants.
